thread.title: New Owner Has Big Plans for the Village Voice
thread.title_full: New Owner Has Big Plans for the Village Voice - WSJ

author: Mike Vilensky
title: New Owner Has Big Plans for the Village Voice
text:
Earlier this month at an under-construction condominium, Peter Barbey was reminded of why he wanted to move to New York City.
“I was with a guy from the construction company, and he was reading ‘Infinite Jest,’ ” Mr. Barbey said, referring to the 1,079-page David Foster Wallace novel. “After the tour was over, I said: ‘Only in New York would the construction guy be carrying a copy of ‘Infinite Jest.’ How cool is that?”
